What We Do

Our Mission is to provide local families in need with Food, Emergency Financial Assistance and Skill Building Education to create Self Sufficiency.

We Provide For...

Residents of Plainwell and Otsego school districts.

We Help With...

Rental payments, Utility assistance, Medical expenses, and Prescription costs (no pain, narcotic or controlled substances) for residents of Plainwell, Otsego, and Martin school districts.

We Teach To..

Help you take control of your financial life. Budgeting, GED, and much more.

How To Help

There are several different ways that you may help Christian Neighbors. We appreciate any and all support that you may provide. We certainly could not succeed in our mission if not for the support of our wonderful community. You may help us through monetary or food donations, buying us something from our Amazon Wishlist, submitting a volunteer application, or checking out our 'Leaving a Legacy' program.

What People Say About Us

We take our responsibility of improving our community very seriously. Check out what some of our supporters and clients have to say about us...

How You Can Reach Us

Feel free to call us at (269)685-4166 or email our office at info@christianneighbors.org. If you'd like to reach a specific employee or review who's who at Christian Neighbors please see our directory here...

Upcoming Events

Throughout the year we host many events that may interest you. A few include the Reflection of Hope Auction, PATH Walk, or many Soup Suppers. To see what's upcoming view our calendar...
